mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(stStatisticsDt, '%W') AS `name`, count(`statistics_id`) AS 'data' FROM Statistics_tbl WHERE TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(stStatisticsDt) <= 7 GROUP BY `name`;
SELECT slPageName AS 'name' , COUNT(*) AS 'data' FROM StatisticsLog_tbl Group by name ORDER BY data DESC limit 0,10;
select stClientScreen AS 'name' , COUNT(*) AS 'data' from Statistics_tbl where stClientScreen IS NOT NULL AND TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(stStatisticsDt) <= 30 GROUP BY `name`;
